text: How to Marry a Millionaire is a 1953 American romantic comedy movie directed by Jean Negulesco and based on the plays by ZoÃ« Akins and Katherine Albert. It stars Marilyn Monroe, Betty Grable, Lauren Bacall, David Wayne, Rory Calhoun and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1954 and was later adopted into a television series in 1957. == References == ==Other websites== * * Category:1953 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Jean Negulesco Category:Movies adapted into television series
title: How to Marry a Millionaire
